bio:
Rexus, an Imperial man, is the bodyguard of Amaund Motierre.
Rexus is first encountered by the player in the ancient Nord crypt of Volunruud. He can later be found in the The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Rexus has been with the Motierre family since Amaund was a child.
At Volunruud, upon Amaund's instruction, Rexus will provide the player with Amaund's sealed letter and a jeweled amulet.
name: Rexus
